title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 314: Featuring Seth Jones + Ray Ferraro
description:
On Episode 314 of Spittinâ€™ Chiclets, the guys are joined by Seth Jones and Ray Ferraro. Seth joined (38:44) to discuss his family, playing for Torts, using CBD and more. The guys then talked about all the crazy NHL news, including Zdeno Chara leaving the Boston Bruins. The boys then talk some World Juniors with Ray Ferraro (1:47:07) and wrap the podcast up by giving their predictions for the big USA vs Canada Gold Medal game.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
